description:
after updating to nova rev 530, the Doc makefile reports an error with:


k:doc kpepple$ make
sphinx-build -b html -d build/doctrees   source build/html
Running Sphinx v1.0.5

Exception occurred:
  File "/Users/kpepple/Documents/dev/openstack/nova/doc/source/conf.py", line 65, in <module>
    release = nova_version.version()
AttributeError: 'module' object has no attribute 'version'
The full traceback has been saved in /var/folders/dN/dNhBWTjkEzyfNST2KobG8U+++TM/-Tmp-/sphinx-err-79Gstn.log, if you want to report the issue to the developers.


This appears to be a side effect of changing to the new nova versioning interface. I think this is a three line fix ... I will submit a patch.
title: Doc make broken by rev530 nova version change

comments.content:
after updating to nova rev 530, the Doc makefile reports an error with:


k:doc kpepple$ make
sphinx-build -b html -d build/doctrees   source build/html
Running Sphinx v1.0.5

Exception occurred:

AttributeError: 'module' object has no attribute 'version'
The full traceback has been saved in /var/folders/dN/dNhBWTjkEzyfNST2KobG8U+++TM/-Tmp-/sphinx-err-79Gstn.log, if you want to report the issue to the developers.


This appears to be a side effect of changing to the new nova versioning interface. I think this is a three line fix ... I will submit a patch.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~ken-pepple

comments.content: Apologies ... this appears to be fixed in http://bazaar.launchpad.net/~anso/nova/trunk_safe/revision/531 but not merged yet
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~ken-pepple
